## Collect & Create

-   Integration and organisation of data sets and collection process require enable access to multiple data sources.

    | Primary Data Sources | Secondary Data Sources | Big Data Sources  |
    |----------------------|------------------------|-------------------|
    | Text delimited files | RDBMS                  | GIS               |
    | Excel spreadsheets   | API                    | Sensor-based data |
    | Google sheets        | No-SQL databases       | Websites          |

## Analyse & Collaborate

-   Analysing research data may require simple descriptive statistics, diagnostic analytics, predictive analytics to prescriptive analytics. You need a rich family of packages and functions to run these different analytics.

-   Further, you may need to functionalities to collaborate with your team.
